text:
Anyone know why Plots/GR on Ubuntu looks slightly different when exported to PNG than it does on Windows/Mac?
<https://github.com/JuliaTesting/ReferenceTests.jl/pull/77#issuecomment-779469226>

elements.text: Anyone know why Plots/GR on Ubuntu looks slightly different when exported to PNG than it does on Windows/Mac?

text: Try with ImageIO? PNGFiles (which is bundled into that) has been pretty extensively tested for accuracy

elements.text: Try with ImageIO? PNGFiles (which is bundled into that) has been pretty extensively tested for accuracy
It’s also faster than ImageMagick

text:
Apprently
1.  I need to support TIFF
2. ImageIO does not support TIFF <https://github.com/JuliaIO/FileIO.jl/blob/1df503324dc411f45b4c0e93ef78c8dcf4aafe4f/src/registry.jl#L260>
I will test it out though to see if it fixes PNGs though.
